name: 9 Lives (ENSA-Versailles Studios)
description:
9 Lives was thought as a narrative game in open world where the player will be able to alternate between two characters with strangely linked stories. Separated in 2 chapters, we propose you today to complete the first one.

looking like a platformer, rolling you're mechanical will not be enough to advance in the story! You will have to investigate, find clues and complete small objectives in a given time to avoid returning to square one.

If it was thought as a game, 9 Lives is also an experience. It's about experiencing the roofs of a city, a fragment of our growing urbanity through a new prism. What happens when a user finds himself walking through an environment designed for and by another species?

Dev Team :

De Bernede Mathias

Joubert Felix

Polycarpe Alexandre

Supervised by : Fabien Duchene and César Trublard.

E.N.S.A.V
